actions.desc: The dragon can use its Aura of Madness. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.desc: As ancient void dragon, with DC 18 Wisdom saving throw.
actions.name: Aura of Madness

actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:
actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)

actions.desc: The dragon exhales a 60-foot cube of powerful localized gravity, originating from the dragon. Falling damage in the area increases to 1d10 per 10 feet fallen. When a creature starts its turn within the area or enters it for the first time in a turn, including when the dragon creates the field, must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the creature is restrained. On a success the creature's speed is halved as long as it remains in the field. A restrained creature repeats the saving throw at the end of its turn. The field persists until the dragon's breath recharges, and it can't use gravitic breath twice consecutively.
actions.name: Gravitic Breath

actions.desc: The dragon exhales star fire in a 60- foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (9d6) fire damage and 31 (9d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Stellar Flare Breath

actions.desc: The dragon magically teleports to any open space within 100 feet.
actions.name: Teleport

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
legendary_actions.name: Detect

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.
legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon twists the fabric of space. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then teleport to an unoccupied space within 40 feet.
legendary_actions.name: Void Slip (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon can magically reach into its treasure hoard and retrieve one item. If it is holding an item, it can use this ability to deposit the item into its hoard.
legendary_actions.name: Void Cache (Costs 3 Actions)

legendary_desc: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
name: Adult Void Dragon

reactions.desc: When the dragon is hit by a ranged attack it can create a small rift in space to increase its AC by 5 against that attack. If the attack misses because of this increase the dragon can choose a creature within 30 feet to become the new target for that attack. Use the original attack roll to determine if the attack hits the new target.
reactions.name: Void Twist

special_abilities.desc: Cold damage dealt by the void dragon ignores resistance to cold damage, but not cold immunity.
special_abilities.name: Chill of the Void

special_abilities.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
